thread.title: Philipp Lahm retires: Bayern Munich and Germany legend to walk away from Bundesliga club at the end of the season after rejecting director role
thread.title_full: Philipp Lahm retires: Bayern Munich and Germany legend to walk away from Bundesliga club at the end of the season after rejecting director role

author: ashilton
title: Philipp Lahm retires: Bayern Munich and Germany legend to walk away from Bundesliga club at the end of the season after rejecting director role
text:
EFL I've had my Phil! Philipp Lahm retires: Bayern Munich and Germany legend to walk away from Bundesliga club at the end of the season after rejecting director role 
Lahm, 33, was offered a role upstairs at the Allianz Arena but has knocked it back due to a change in hierarchy at club By ALEC SHILTON
